patient_info: Cardiomegaly,Dyspnea,Abdominal distention,Exercise intolerance,Poor appetite,Myocarditis,Increased circulating NT-proBNP concentration
golden_diagnosis: Neonatal Marfan syndrome,Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Cardiomyopathy, Familial Restrictive, 1 (家族性/特发性限制型心肌病/Familial/Idiopathic restrictive cardiomyopathy)
2. Hypertrophic Cardiomyopathy, Familial (家族性肥厚型心肌病/Familial hypertrophic cardiomyopathy)
3. Dilated Cardiomyopathy, 1KK (1KK型扩张型心肌病)
4. Cardiomyopathy, Hypertrophic (肥厚型心肌病/Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy)
5. Cardiomyopathy, Dilated (扩张型心肌病/Dilated cardiomyopathy)
6. Myocarditis (心肌炎)
7. Heart Failure, Due to Cardiomyopathy (由于心肌病导致的心脏衰竭)
8. Cardiac Endometriosis (心脏内Endometriosis)
9. Cardiomyopathy, Familial, 3 (家族性/特发性限制型心肌病/Familial/Idiopathic restrictive cardiomyopathy,第三种)
10. Unspecified Cardiomyopathy (未特定型心肌病)
